com.chaining

Class Optional<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chaining.Optional<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DefaultIfEmpty<T>, io.reactivex.functions.Function<io.reactivex.functions.Consumer<T>,Optional<T>>

    public class Optional<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.reactivex.functions.Function<io.reactivex.functions.Consumer<T>,Optional<T>>, DefaultIfEmpty<T>
    a class that acts as an RxJava Maybe, but it returns back to the Chain if possible

    Created by Ahmed Adel Ismail on 11/6/2017.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<T> apply(io.reactivex.functions.Consumer<T> action)
      apply an action to the stored item if not null
      Chain<T> defaultIfEmpty(T defaultValue)
      if the root item is converted to null due to any operation (like map() for example), this function will set it to a new default value
      <R> Optional<R> map(io.reactivex.functions.Function<T,R> mapper)
      apply an action to the stored item if not null, this action will cause the stored item to be changed to the new type (it will return a new Optional with the new type)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • defaultIfEmpty

        public Chain<T> defaultIfEmpty(@NonNull
                               T defaultValue)
        Description copied from interface: DefaultIfEmpty
        if the root item is converted to null due to any operation (like map() for example), this function will set it to a new default value
        Specified by:
        defaultIfEmpty in interface DefaultIfEmpty<T>
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - the default value if the Object is null
        Returns:
        a new Chain with the default value, if the current Chain was broken by a null root, else it will return the same Chain to continue

      • apply

        public Optional<T> apply(io.reactivex.functions.Consumer<T> action)
        apply an action to the stored item if not null
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        action - the action to be applied
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining

      • map

        public <R> Optional<R> map(io.reactivex.functions.Function<T,R> mapper)
        apply an action to the stored item if not null, this action will cause the stored item to be changed to the new type (it will return a new Optional with the new type)
        Type Parameters:
        R - the expected type to be mapped for
        Parameters:
        mapper - the action to be applied
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining
